content:
Great choices! Both Ticket to Ride and Carcassonne are modern classics and highly regarded in the board gaming community.

You can find these games at a variety of online retailers, brick-and-mortar game stores, and even some big-box retailers. Here are some popular options with good deals:

**Online Retailers:**

1. **Amazon**: Amazon offers competitive pricing, fast shipping, and often has deals on board games. You can check the prices for [Ticket to Ride](https://www.amazon.com/Ticket-Ride-Board-Game/dp/B000FKLXH4/) and [Carcassonne](https://www.amazon.com/Carcassonne-Board-Game-2009-Edition/dp/B004M3XUXG/).
2. **Board Game Geek (BGG) Store**: The official online store of Board Game Geek, a popular board gaming community website. They often have competitive pricing and a wide selection of games. Check out [Ticket to Ride](https://store.boardgamegeek.com/product/ticket-to-ride) and [Carcassonne](https://store.boardgamegeek.com/product/carcassonne).
3. **CoolStuffInc**: A popular online retailer specializing in tabletop games. They offer competitive pricing, free shipping on orders over $100, and a rewards program. Check out [Ticket to Ride](https://www.coolstuffinc.com/ticket-to-ride-15th-anniversary-edition) and [Carcassonne](https://www.coolstuffinc.com/carcassonne-2014-edition).

**Brick-and-Mortar Retailers:**

1. **GameStop**: Although primarily a video game retailer, GameStop has expanded their board game selection in recent years. You can find Ticket to Ride and Carcassonne at many GameStop locations.
2. **Target**: Many Target stores carry a limited selection of board games, including Ticket to Ride and Carcassonne.
3. **Local Game Stores (LGS)**: Visit your local game store or comic book shop, as they often carry a variety of board games, including Ticket to Ride and Carcassonne. These stores may also offer demos, events, and expert advice.

**Deals and Discounts:**

1. **Look for bundle deals**: Some retailers offer discounts when purchasing multiple games together.
2. **Check for sales and clearance**: Keep an eye on retailers' websites and social media for sales, discounts, or clearance events.
3. **Use coupons and promo codes**: Sign up for newsletters or follow retailers on social media to receive exclusive coupons and promo codes.
4. **Consider used or second-hand games**: You can find gently used copies of Ticket to Ride and Carcassonne at a lower price point from online marketplaces like Amazon or eBay, or from local game stores.

Remember to check the prices and shipping costs before making a purchase, as they may vary between retailers. Happy gaming!
